name: 2022 10th International Conference on Smart Grid and Clean Energy Technologies
content: Publication: 1\. All papers registered to ICSGCE will be included in Conference Proceedings by IEEE, which will be submitted for Ei Compendex and Scopus. 2\. Alternatively, the authors can select to publish their papers in Scopus indexed journal: IJEETC (ISSN: 2319-2518) http://www.ijeetc.com/ 3\. All papers registered to Special Session on EET will be published in Scopus indexed journal: JEST (ISSN: 1674-862X). http://www.journal.uestc.edu.cn/EN/volumn/home.shtml
